Our Story

Strategy Translated Into Results

    Our Vision: Clarity, Alignment, Flexibility

    Dialog pursues clarity and precise alignment across purpose, strategy and execution. We can help you rebuild your business around ever shortening strategy and execution cycles.

    Our Approach: Analysis, Expertise, Advice

    Dialog leaders have 20+ years experience combining top tier strategy consulting, digital agency creativity, and general management and marketing consulting work.

     

    Our Clients: Upstarts, Blue Chips, Pioneers

    We serve a client base that is as large and varied as our skill set. Global brander leaders in technology, hospitality, and healthcare, along with emerging leaders in diverse spaces all rely on Dialog for our ability to help them quickly identify and act on new opportunities for growth.

    I’ve never had greater trust in a marketing partner. Dialog always has my best interest in mind, and is a partner in the truest sense. Their ability to marry “deep strategy” with an unmatched depth of experience in Healthcare, Education and Government is a home run for anyone marketing in these markets. They are my go-to partner for Public Sector expertise.

    Frances Fortanley
    Marketing Director, Vmware

    The Dialog Team understands Education. They bring a deep customer-centric approach to their work, they are masters of the technology industry, and experts in marketing (at times, Dialog understood our solutions better than our own team). They bring it all together like no other firm I have seen to deliver results.

    Anne Poindexter
    Director of World-Wide Sales Enablement, Adobe

    Dialog’s approach is unique in that the experience they bring at a strategic level, along with the ability to quickly execute, makes them an attractive partner to any marketing organization. They seamlessly integrate their team and increase confidence in knowing the right decisions are being made on your behalf.

    Mark Scholz
    World Wide Marketing Communications, TSG, Hewlett-Packard

    What We Do: Growth Acceleration

    Dialog helps clients leverage changes as an advantage and engine of innovation across their entire business, building breakthrough opportunities for market domination.
